mapper.select: SELECT reservation_user_comment.comment AS comment, reservation_user_comment.id AS id, reservation_user_comment.create_date AS createdDate, reservation_user_comment.modify_date AS modifiedDate, product.id AS productId, reservation_info.reservation_date AS reservationDate, reservation_info.reservation_email AS reservationEmail, reservation_info.id AS reservationInfoId, reservation_info.reservation_name AS reservationName, reservation_info.reservation_tel AS reservationTelephone, reservation_user_comment.score AS score FROM product INNER JOIN reservation_user_comment ON product.id = reservation_user_comment.product_id INNER JOIN reservation_info ON reservation_info.id = reservation_user_comment.reservation_info_id INNER JOIN display_info ON display_info.product_id = product.id WHERE display_info.id = #{displayInfoId} ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT AVG(score) FROM reservation_user_comment INNER JOIN reservation_info ON reservation_info.id = reservation_user_comment.reservation_info_id INNER JOIN display_info ON display_info.product_id = reservation_user_comment.product_id WHERE display_info.id = #{displayInfoId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservation_user_comment INNER JOIN reservation_info ON reservation_user_comment.reservation_info_id = reservation_info.id INNER JOIN display_info ON display_info.product_id = reservation_user_comment.product_id WHERE display_info.id = #{displayInfoId}
